DOC.brief_summary: Aim study evaluate benefit adjunctive intracoronary administration adenosin elective patient undergo coronary angioplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Intracoronary Adenosine Administration Prevent Periprocedural Myonecrosis Elective Coronary Angioplasty
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate effect adjunctive intracoronary administration adenosine periprocedural myocardial infarction compare placebo . This double-blind randomized trial single-center study . The enrollment last 10 month .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective coronary angioplasty Marked Bradycardia ( < 40 bpm ) Previous allergy adenosine Inability sign inform consent Asthma Elevated cardiac enzyme ( troponin I CKMB )
